Title: The Thieving Mistake
Plot: While at the airport seeing Albert off on a trip, the team encounters `Liability' Finch, a hapless friend of Ash who is in hot water with a customs officer and a Russian art collector as a result of a bungled painting theft. Despite being ordered by Mickey to lie low and avoid trouble, Sean sets out to help Finch, with disastrous consequences.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Mark Benton, Adrian Lester, Matt Di Angelo
